languages.text: Уютный уголок для отдыха полностью разгромлен. Повсюду разбросаны обломки мебели и осколки, а пол и обивку покрывают темные пятна.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Барк про убранство кают-компании — камин и столики рядом

languages.text: The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.
languages.original_text: Уютный уголок для отдыха полностью разгромлен. Повсюду разбросаны обломки мебели и осколки, а пол и обивку покрывают темные пятна.

traits.locale_text: The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.
The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.
The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.

languages.text: 舒适的座位区域被彻底摧毁。家具残片与碎屑散落一地，地板与装饰材料蒙上了一层黑乎乎的污渍。
languages.original_text: The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.

traits.locale_text: 舒适的座位区域被彻底摧毁。家具残片与碎屑散落一地，地板与装饰材料蒙上了一层黑乎乎的污渍。

languages.text: La cómoda zona de descanso está totalmente destrozada. Hay fragmentos de mobiliario y astillas desperdigados por toda la sala, y unas manchas negras cubren el suelo y el tapizado.
languages.original_text: The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.

traits.locale_text: La cómoda zona de descanso está totalmente destrozada. Hay fragmentos de mobiliario y astillas desperdigados por toda la sala, y unas manchas negras cubren el suelo y el tapizado.

languages.text: 心地よい座席エリアは完全に破壊されている。家具の破片や木片がいたるところに散乱し、黒いしみが床と装飾品を覆っている。
languages.original_text: The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.

traits.locale_text: 心地よい座席エリアは完全に破壊されている。家具の破片や木片がいたるところに散乱し、黒いしみが床と装飾品を覆っている。
心地よい座席エリアは完全に破壊されている。家具の破片や木片がいたるところに散乱し、黒いしみが床と装飾品を覆っている。

languages.text: Ce coin salon est complètement détruit. Des débris de meubles sont éparpillés partout. Leur capitonnage et le sol sont constellés de taches sombres.
languages.original_text: The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.

traits.locale_text: Ce coin salon est complètement détruit. Des débris de meubles sont éparpillés partout. Leur capitonnage et le sol sont constellés de taches sombres.

languages.text: Der gemütliche Sitzbereich ist komplett zerstört. Überreste von Möbeln und Splitter liegen überall herum, und Boden und Polster sind voller dunkler Flecken.
languages.original_text: The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.

traits.locale_text: Der gemütliche Sitzbereich ist komplett zerstört. Überreste von Möbeln und Splitter liegen überall herum, und Boden und Polster sind voller dunkler Flecken.

languages.text: Konforlu görünen oturma alanı yerle yeksan edilmiş. Mobilya parçaları ve kıymıklar her yere saçılmış durumda. Koyu lekeler, kumaş kaplamalara ve zemine hükmediyor.
languages.original_text: The cosy seating area is completely destroyed. Pieces of furniture and splinters are scattered everywhere, and dark stains cover the floor and upholstery.

traits.locale_text: Konforlu görünen oturma alanı yerle yeksan edilmiş. Mobilya parçaları ve kıymıklar her yere saçılmış durumda. Koyu lekeler, kumaş kaplamalara ve zemine hükmediyor.
